Forwindz.CustomCornerstones_SaladRecipe_: Villagers enjoy the fresh and original taste more. <sprite name="[food raw] herbs"><sprite name="[food raw] grain"><sprite name="[mat raw] algae"> are ediable now.
Forwindz.CustomCornerstones_FoolhardyGam: Only {0} will arrive to your settlement now, and arrive {1} quicker. Each perk or blueprint sold by {0} has {2} chance to become free
Forwindz.CustomCornerstones_GardenDesign: Reduce {0} required villagers for upgrading hearths, all decorative buildings provide extra {1} decoration point. However, the villagers' rest time increase {2}.
Forwindz.CustomCornerstones_UsabilityDes: Each point of Harmony, Aesthetics, and Comfort decoration will provide {0} double production chance, movement speed, and harvest speed respectively.
Each point of Comfort decoration will provide {0} harvest speed.
Each point of Aesthetics decoration will provide {0} movement speed.
Each point of Harmony decoration will provide {0} double production chance.
Forwindz.CustomCornerstones_OverdraftTec: The other Viceroys agreed to give up their cornerstone quota for this year. You will get additional legendary cornerstone selections {0} times, and there will be no more cornerstone selection rewards at the beginning of each year.
Forwindz.CustomCornerstones_AmberFluctua: At the beginning of each season, the selling value of amber will fluctuate {0}
OverdraftTechnicalContract_npcDialogue: This is the cornerstone quota transferred to you by other Viceroys. As the price of the contract, the cornerstone quota of this settlement will be transferred to other governors in the future.
